name: Zephyr (itch) (ajeanselme, LynnChoco)
description:
Zephyr, the swift messenger, found the Wind Crystal and by that angered the Storm Lord. Enter the Storm Lord's fortress to give him back his crystal, but be careful ! Thinking you stole the crystal, the Storm Lord will unleash his power to take you down. Will you be able to attain the Lord's den ?

Zephyr is a platformer game, in which you control the player by running, jumping and using walls as platforms. Avoid obstacles and the flood caused by the Storm and get to the Storm Lord's room safely to win.

Move : A and D/Q and D/Directional Arrows

Jump : Space Bar

Game Artist - Lyna KRIATI

Game Developer - Antoine JEANSELME

Music - Purple Planet
